name: Mehnazeee😍✨
greetingText: A girl with kind eyes, beautiful long hair, a sweet smile, and a heart full of grace. (paavam kutti)
text1: It's your 21st birthday! 😍🍰 Let’s cherish this day with deep feelings and beautiful memories.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I Tought, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very Special to me!
replayText: Come back with that smile 😊❤️, Or click again, if you want to feel it one more time.
